alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 7:24PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN HARDING COUNTY THROUGH 800 PM MDT... At 724 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Camp Crook, or 23 miles west of Buffalo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Harding County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northwestern South Dakota.
